references.paper_title: Nerf: Representing scenes as neural radiance fields for view synthesis
references.reason: This paper introduced Neural Radiance Fields (NeRFs), a foundational technique for novel view synthesis that is heavily built upon in the current work.

references.paper_title: 3D Gaussian splatting for real-time radiance field rendering
references.reason: This paper introduced 3D Gaussian splatting, which is the core 3D representation used in the current work and significantly improves rendering speed and efficiency compared to NeRFs.

references.paper_title: Mip-NeRF: A multiscale representation for anti-aliasing neural radiance fields
references.reason: Mip-NeRF is a key improvement on the original NeRF formulation that addresses limitations like aliasing artifacts, making it a crucial reference for high-quality novel view synthesis.

references.paper_title: Context encoders: Feature learning by inpainting
references.reason: This paper introduced a pioneering deep learning approach for image inpainting, providing a foundation for the 2D inpainting methods that are integrated into the 3D pipeline of the current work.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper significantly advanced diffusion models for image generation, leading to improved image quality and coherence, which is leveraged in the detail enhancement stage of the proposed method.
